mapper.select: select requirement_order_id, requirement_order_no, requirement_order_type, requirement_order_status, requirement_order_priority, requirement_order_plant_id, requirement_order_work_center_id, requirement_order_fg_material_id, requirement_order_planned_qty, requirement_order_required_delivery_date, requirement_order_sale_order_no, requirement_order_repeat_type, work_center_no, work_center_name, material_no, material_name from requirement_order join material on requirement_order_fg_material_id = material_id join work_center on requirement_order_work_center_id = work_center_id
mapper.insert: insert into bom(bom_order_id,component_type,component_material_id,component_abstract_material_id,component_uom_id,component_material_match_rule_id,if_main_fabric,parent_bom_id) select (#{bomOrderId},component_type,component_material_id,component_abstract_material_id,component_uom_id,component_material_match_rule_id,if_main_fabric,parent_bom_id) from bom where bom_order_id=#{scheduleBomOrderId}
